text: László Szabó (born 1905, date of death unknown) was a Hungarian fencing master. He was born in Târgu Mureș. He is known for his book Fencing and The Master, a classic of modern fencing. He wrote it after a lifetime of accumulated knowledge, including learning to teach fencing from his beloved maestro Italo Santelli. Category:1905 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Hungarian male fencers
title: László Szabó (fencer)
